Name: Cards_HW
Expression:
"
" & ipl_matches_data[venue] & "
" & FORMAT(ipl_matches_data[match_date],"dd-mmm-yyyy") & "
" & ipl_matches_data[team1] & "
" & ipl_matches_data[team2] & "
" & ipl_matches_data[result] & "
"

Name: Cards_HW
Expression:
"
" & Schedule[Location] & "
" & FORMAT(Schedule[dateTimeGMT],"dd-mmm-yyyy, hh:mm AM/PM") & "
" & Schedule[Team1] & " (" & Schedule[Team1_SN] & ")
" & Schedule[Team2] & " (" & Schedule[Team2_SN] & ")
" & Schedule[Status] & "
"

Name: Match_Card_HTML
Expression:
VAR MonthText = UPPER(FORMAT([date], "MMM")) VAR WeekdayAbbr = UPPER(LEFT(FORMAT([date], "dddd"))) VAR MatchDate = MonthText & ", " & WeekdayAbbr & " " RETURN "
" & [stadium] & " " & [city] & "
" & UPPER(FORMAT([date], "MMM, ddd d")) & "
" & SWITCH( TRUE(), [match no] = "Final", "FINAL", [match no] = "Qualifier 1", "QUALIFIER 1", [match no] = "Eliminator", "ELIMINATOR", [match no] = "Qualifier 2", "QUALIFIER 2", [match no] ) & "
" & [Team1] & "
" & [Team1_Score] & "
" & [Team1_overs] & "
V/S
" & [Team2] & "
" & [Team2_Score] & "
" & [Team2_Overs] & "
" & [Result] & "
"

Name: Match_Sort_Order
Expression:
SWITCH(TRUE(),
    'Match_Schedule'[match no] = "Final", 1000,
    'Match_Schedule'[match no] = "Qualifier 2", 999,
    'Match_Schedule'[match no] = "Eliminator", 998,
    'Match_Schedule'[match no] = "Qualifier 1", 997,
    LEFT('Match_Schedule'[match no], 5) = "Match", 
        VALUE(RIGHT('Match_Schedule'[match no], LEN('Match_Schedule'[match no]) - 6)),
    BLANK()
)

Name: Results_Cards
Expression:
"
"&FORMAT(Schedule[dateTimeGMT],"dd-mmm, hh:mm AM/PM")&"
"&Schedule[Location]&"
"&Schedule[Team1]&"
"&Schedule[Team2]&"
"&Schedule[Status]&"
"

Name: Score_Cards
Expression:
"
" & All_Matches_Score[ms] & " • " & All_Matches_Score[matchType] & " • Starts: " & FORMAT(All_Matches_Score[dateTimeGMT],"d-mmm-yy @ hh:mmAM/PM") & "
" & All_Matches_Score[t1_SN] & "
" & All_Matches_Score[t1s] & "
" & All_Matches_Score[t2_SN] & "
" & All_Matches_Score[t2s] & "
" & All_Matches_Score[status] & "
"

Name: Top_Players
Expression:
"
"&Records[Type]&"
"&Records[Name]&"
"&Records[Value]&"
"&Records[Type]&"
1st Position
"

Name: Best Economy Bowler Image
Expression:
VAR BestBowler =
    [Best Economy Bowler Name]   // this is  measure that already applies the 3+ overs filter
RETURN
    CALCULATE (
        MAX (players_data[player_image] ),
        players_data[player_name] = BestBowler
    )

Name: Best Economy Bowler Name
Expression:
VAR BestVal = [Best Economy Value]
RETURN
MAXX (
    FILTER (
        VALUES ( ball_by_ball_data[bowler] ),
        [Economy Rate] = BestVal
            && CALCULATE ( [Legal Balls Bowled] ) >= 18
    ),
    ball_by_ball_data[bowler]
)

Name: Best Economy Bowler Team
Expression:
VAR BestBowler = [Best Economy Bowler Name]
RETURN
CALCULATE (
    MAX ( ball_by_ball_data[team_bowling] ),
    KEEPFILTERS ( ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = BestBowler )
)

Name: Best Economy Value
Expression:
MINX (
    FILTER (
        VALUES ( ball_by_ball_data[bowler] ),
        CALCULATE ( [Legal Balls Bowled] ) >= 18   -- at least 3 overs
    ),
    [Economy Rate]
)

Name: BG_Records_Color
Expression:
var Or_Img = "#ff481e"
var Pu_Img = "#692f9e"
var De_Img = "#0d1e49"
RETURN SWITCH(SELECTEDVALUE(Records[Type]),"Orange Cap",Or_Img,"Most Wickets",Pu_Img,De_Img)

Name: BG_Records_IMG
Expression: var Or_Img = "https://i.ibb.co/27H0YCzW/Oragne.png" var Pu_Img = "https://i.ibb.co/7xBjt7f2/Purple.png" var De_Img = "https://i.ibb.co/ktsQkN0/Blue.png" VAR selectIMG = SWITCH(SELECTEDVALUE(Records[Type]),"Orange Cap",Or_Img,"Most Wickets",Pu_Img,De_Img) RETURN " "

Name: Centuries
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonData = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data,RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR BatterRuns = SUMMARIZE(SeasonData,ball_by_ball_data[match_id],ball_by_ball_data[batter], "TotalRuns" , SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR CenturyCount = FILTER(BatterRuns, [TotalRuns] >= 100)

RETURN COUNTROWS(CenturyCount)

Name: CSS_Code_For_Live_Score_Cards
DotBall_Count
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDots = 
    FILTER(
        ball_by_ball_data,
        RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
        ball_by_ball_data[total_runs] = 0 &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wide_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_no_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_leg_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_penalty] = FALSE()
    )

VAR DotSummary = 
    SUMMARIZE(
        SeasonDots,
        ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
        "DotCount", COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                SeasonDots,
                ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
            )
        )
    )

VAR MaxDots = MAXX(DotSummary, [DotCount])

RETURN MaxDots

Name: DotBall_Holder
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

-- Filter dot balls (no runs, no extras) for selected season
VAR SeasonDots = 
    FILTER(
        ball_by_ball_data,
        RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
        ball_by_ball_data[total_runs] = 0 &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wide_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_no_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_leg_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_penalty] = FALSE()
    )

-- Summarize by bowler
VAR DotSummary = 
    SUMMARIZE(
        SeasonDots,
        ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
        "DotCount", COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                SeasonDots,
                ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
            )
        )
    )

-- Max dot balls
VAR MaxDots = MAXX(DotSummary, [DotCount])

-- Get top bowler(s)
VAR TopDotBowler = 
    CALCULATETABLE(
        VALUES(ball_by_ball_data[bowler]),
        FILTER(DotSummary, [DotCount] = MaxDots)
    )

-- Return name
RETURN MAXX(TopDotBowler, ball_by_ball_data[bowler])

Name: DotBall_Holder_Image
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDots = 
    FILTER(
        ball_by_ball_data,
        RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
        ball_by_ball_data[total_runs] = 0 &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wide_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_no_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_leg_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_penalty] = FALSE()
    )

VAR DotSummary = 
    SUMMARIZE(
        SeasonDots,
        ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
        "DotCount", COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                SeasonDots,
                ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
            )
        )
    )

VAR MaxDots = MAXX(DotSummary, [DotCount])

VAR TopDotBowler = 
    CALCULATETABLE(
        VALUES(ball_by_ball_data[bowler]),
        FILTER(DotSummary, [DotCount] = MaxDots)
    )

RETURN
LOOKUPVALUE(
    players_data[player_image],
    players_data[player_name],
    MAXX(TopDotBowler, ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
)

Name: DotBall_Team
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDots = 
    FILTER(
        ball_by_ball_data,
        RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
        ball_by_ball_data[total_runs] = 0 &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wide_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_no_ball] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_leg_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_bye] = FALSE() &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_penalty] = FALSE()
    )

VAR DotSummary = 
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        SUMMARIZE(
            SeasonDots,
            ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
            ball_by_ball_data[team_bowling]
        ),
        "DotCount", COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                SeasonDots,
                ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
            )
        )
    )

VAR MaxDots = MAXX(DotSummary, [DotCount])

RETURN 
    MAXX(
        FILTER(DotSummary, [DotCount] = MaxDots),
        ball_by_ball_data[team_bowling]
    )

Name: Half_Centuries
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonData = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data,RELATED(ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR BatterRuns = SUMMARIZE(SeasonData,ball_by_ball_data[match_id],ball_by_ball_data[batter], "TotalRuns" , SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR CenturyCount = FILTER(BatterRuns, [TotalRuns] >= 50 && [TotalRuns] <100)

RETURN COUNTROWS(CenturyCount)

Name: Legal Balls Bowled
Expression:
COUNTROWS (
    FILTER (
        ball_by_ball_data,
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wide_ball] = FALSE ()
            && ball_by_ball_data[is_no_ball] = FALSE ()
    )
)

Name: Orange Cap Holder
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDataOnly = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR RunSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonDataOnly,ball_by_ball_data [batter], "Total Runs", SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR MaxRuns =  MAXX(RunSummary, [Total Runs])

VAR TopScorer =CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]), FILTER (RunSummary, [Total Runs] = MaxRuns))

RETURN MAXX (TopScorer, ball_by_ball_data[batter])

Name: Orange Cap Holder Image
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDataOnly = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR RunSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonDataOnly,ball_by_ball_data [batter], "Total Runs", SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR MaxRuns =  MAXX(RunSummary, [Total Runs])

VAR TopScorer =CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]), FILTER (RunSummary, [Total Runs] = MaxRuns))

RETURN 
LOOKUPVALUE(players_data[player_image],players_data[player_name],MAXX(TopScorer, ball_by_ball_data[batter]))

Name: Orange Cap Runs
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDataOnly = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR RunSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonDataOnly,ball_by_ball_data [batter], "Total Runs", SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR MaxRuns =  MAXX(RunSummary, [Total Runs])

RETURN MaxRuns

Name: Orange cap Team Name
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

VAR SeasonDataOnly = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason)

VAR RunSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonDataOnly,ball_by_ball_data [batter], "Total Runs", SUM(ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs]))

VAR MaxRuns =  MAXX(RunSummary, [Total Runs])

VAR TopScorer =CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]), FILTER (RunSummary, [Total Runs] = MaxRuns))

VAR FullTeamName = CALCULATE(MAX(ball_by_ball_data[team_batting]), FILTER(SeasonDataOnly,ball_by_ball_data[batter] = MAXX(TopScorer,ball_by_ball_data[batter])))

RETURN FullTeamName

Name: Player_HTML_Card
Expression:
VAR SelectedPlayer = SELECTEDVALUE(Players[PlayerName]) VAR SelectedImage = CALCULATE( MAX(Players[PlayerIMG]), FILTER(Players, Players[PlayerName] = SelectedPlayer) ) VAR SelectedName = CALCULATE( MAX(Players[PlayerName]), FILTER(Players, Players[PlayerName] = SelectedPlayer) ) VAR SelectedIsCaptain = CALCULATE( MAX(Players[Cap]), FILTER(Players, Players[PlayerName] = SelectedPlayer) ) -- Captain fallback values VAR CaptainImage = CALCULATE( MAX(Players[PlayerIMG]), FILTER(Players, Players[Cap] = "Captain") ) VAR CaptainName = CALCULATE( MAX(Players[PlayerName]), FILTER(Players, Players[Cap] = "Captain") ) -- Final resolved values VAR FinalImage = IF(ISBLANK(SelectedImage), CaptainImage, SelectedImage) VAR FinalName = IF(ISBLANK(SelectedName), CaptainName, SelectedName) VAR IsCaptain = IF(ISBLANK(SelectedPlayer), "Captain", SelectedIsCaptain) -- Header Label: "Captain" or "Player" VAR HeaderLabel = IF(IsCaptain = "Captain", "Captain", "Player") RETURN "
" & HeaderLabel & "
" & FinalName & "
"

Name: Purple Cap Team
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data[season])

-- Step 1: Filter valid bowler wickets in selected season
VAR SeasonWickets  =
    FILTER(
        ball_by_ball_data,
        RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
        ball_by_ball_data[is_wicket] = TRUE() &&
        NOT ball_by_ball_data[wicket_kind] IN {"run out", "retired hurt", "retired out", "obstructing the field"}
    )

-- Step 2: Summarize wickets per bowler
 VAR WicketSummary =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        SUMMARIZE(
        SeasonWickets,
        ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
        ball_by_ball_data[team_bowling]
        ),
        "WicketCount", 
        COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                SeasonWickets,
                ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler])
            )
        )
    )

 --  Step 3: Get the highest wicket count
 VAR MaxWickets = MAXX(WicketSummary, [WicketCount])

 -- Step 4: Return full team name of the top wicket-taker
 RETURN
    MAXX(
        FILTER(WicketSummary, [WicketCount] =MaxWickets),ball_by_ball_data[team_bowling]
        
    )

Name: Purple Cap_Holder
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data[season])

--Filter: wickets in selected season, exclude non-bowler dismissals
VAR Seasonwickets = 
FILTER(
    ball_by_ball_data,
    RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&
    ball_by_ball_data[is_wicket] = TRUE() && 
    NOT ball_by_ball_data[wicket_kind] IN { "run out", "retired hurt", "obstructing the field", "retired out"}
)

-- Summarize bowler and count wickets
 VAR WicketSummary =
 SUMMARIZE(
        SeasonWickets,
        ball_by_ball_data[bowler],
        "WicketCount", COUNTROWS(
            FILTER (SeasonWickets, ball_by_ball_data[bowler] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[bowler]))
    )
 )
-- Find highest wicket count
 VAR MaxWickets = MAXX(WicketSummary, [WicketCount])

-- Get the bowler(s) with that wicket count
VAR TopBowler =
        CALCULATETABLE(
            VALUES(ball_by_ball_data[bowler]),
            FILTER (WicketSummary, [WicketCount] = MaxWickets)
)

--Return the name (if multiple, it picks one alaphabetically) using lookup from player table
RETURN
MAXX(TopBowler,ball_by_ball_data[bowler]
)

Name: PurpleCapWicketCount
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data[season])

-- Step 1: Filter valid bowler wickets in selected season
VAR SeasonWickets  =

Name: Records_IMG
Expression: " "

Name: Runner_UP
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason =  SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

 VAR FinalMatchDate = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_date]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason)

  VAR FinalMatchWinner = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_winner]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )


  VAR Team1 = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[team1]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  VAR Team2 = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[team2]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  RETURN 
  IF(FinalMatchWinner=Team1,Team2,Team1)

Name: Runner_UP_LOGO
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason =  SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

 VAR FinalMatchDate = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_date]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason)

  VAR FinalMatchWinner = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_winner]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )


  VAR Team1 = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[team1]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  VAR Team2 = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[team2]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  RETURN 
 LOOKUPVALUE(teams_data[image_url],teams_data[team_name],[Runner_UP])

Name: Seson_winner
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason =  SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

 VAR FinalMatchDate = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_date]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason)

  VAR FinalMatchWinner = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_winner]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  RETURN FinalMatchWinner

Name: Seson_winner_Logo
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason =  SELECTEDVALUE(ipl_matches_data[season])

 VAR FinalMatchDate = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_date]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason)

  VAR FinalMatchWinner = CALCULATE(MAX(ipl_matches_data[match_winner]),ipl_matches_data[season] = SelectedSeason,ipl_matches_data[match_date] = FinalMatchDate )

  RETURN

Name: Top Fours Count
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 4 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
RETURN MaxFours

Name: Top Fours player Image
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 4 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
RETURN 
LOOKUPVALUE(
    players_data[player_image],
    players_data[player_name], MAXX(TopFoursPlayer, ball_by_ball_data[batter])
)

Name: Top Fours Player Name
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 4 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
RETURN MAXX(TopFoursPlayer, ball_by_ball_data[batter])

Name: Top Fours player Team  Name
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 4 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
VAR BatterTeam = CALCULATE(MAX(ball_by_ball_data[team_batting]),FILTER(SeasonFours,ball_by_ball_data[batter] = MAXX(TopFoursPlayer,ball_by_ball_data[batter])))

RETURN BatterTeam

Name: Top Six Count
Expression:

VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 6 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
RETURN MaxFours

Name: Top Six player Image

VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 6 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
RETURN 
LOOKUPVALUE(
    players_data[player_image],
    players_data[player_name], MAXX(TopFoursPlayer, ball_by_ball_data[batter])
)

Name: Top Six Player Name
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 6 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
RETURN MAXX(TopFoursPlayer, ball_by_ball_data[batter])

Name: Top Six player Team  Name
Expression:
VAR SelectedSeason = SELECTEDVALUE (ipl_matches_data [season])
VAR SeasonFours = FILTER(ball_by_ball_data, RELATED (ipl_matches_data[season]) = SelectedSeason &&ball_by_ball_data[batter_runs] = 6 )

VAR FourSummary = SUMMARIZE (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter], "FoursCount",COUNTROWS(FILTER (SeasonFours, ball_by_ball_data[batter] = EARLIER(ball_by_ball_data[batter]))))

VAR MaxFours = MAXX(FourSummary, [FoursCount])
VAR TopFoursPlayer = CALCULATETABLE (VALUES (ball_by_ball_data[batter]),FILTER (FourSummary, [FoursCount] = MaxFours))
VAR BatterTeam = CALCULATE(MAX(ball_by_ball_data[team_batting]),FILTER(SeasonFours,ball_by_ball_data[batter] = MAXX(TopFoursPlayer,ball_by_ball_data[batter])))

RETURN BatterTeam
